About.subtitle: Discover Our Mission
About.title: We Are Dedicated to
About.description: Our mission is to make Quran learning accessible to everyone, everywhere. We combine traditional teaching methods with modern technology to provide an engaging and effective learning experience.

Pricing.title: Simple, Transparent Pricing
Pricing.subtitle: Choose the plan that best fits your learning goals. No hidden fees.

basic.name: Basic
basic.description: Perfect for beginners starting their journey.

standard.name: Standard
standard.description: Ideal for regular learners needing consistency.

Teachers.title: Meet Our Expert Tutors
Teachers.subtitle: Learn from Al-Azhar certified tutors who are passionate about teaching Quran and Tajweed.

Contact.title: Get In Touch
Contact.subtitle: Have questions? We would love to hear from you. Send us a message and we will get back to you shortly.

Footer.description: The best platform to learn Quran online with expert tutors worldwide.
Footer.newsletterDesc: Subscribe to get updates and special offers.

Hero.description: Join thousands of students worldwide in learning Quran, Tajweed, and Arabic from certified tutors. Experience a spiritual journey with modern technology.

card.title: Interactive Learning
card.desc: Join live sessions with one-click access.

Features.title: Why Choose Us
Features.subtitle: We provide the best environment for learning the Holy Quran with advanced tools and expert guidance.

certifiedTutors.title: Certified Tutors
certifiedTutors.desc: Learn from Al-Azhar certified tutors with Ijazah.

interactive.title: Interactive Classroom
interactive.desc: Live video and audio sessions with whiteboard.

flexible.title: Flexible Scheduling
flexible.desc: Book classes at times that suit your lifestyle.

reports.title: Progress Reports
reports.desc: Track your progress with detailed analytics.
